abstract: The Goldman Sachs Group has named Edward C. Forst as the co-head of the investment management unit that oversees more than $796 billion in assets.
snippet: The Goldman Sachs Group has named Edward C. Forst as the co-head of the investment management unit that oversees more than $796 billion in assets.
lead_paragraph: The Goldman Sachs Group has named Edward C. Forst as the co-head of the investment management unit that oversees more than $796 billion in assets, including the Global Alpha hedge fund, filling a position vacated three months ago.
